ygData.subject: RE: RE: Soloing, and Vs. other Classed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not! I have zero doubt that the druid will lose.  They have far too poor an AC to compete.  The Shaman on the other hand had a strength 50 points higher
ygData.messageBody:
>How can I put this... You are wrong. Dead wrong.

Not!

I have zero doubt that the druid will lose. They have far too poor an AC to
compete. The Shaman on the other hand had a strength 50 points higher than
me and a stamina 40 points higher. He had nearly 25% more hit points than I
did at the same level and an ac a whopping 7 points lower. That would be
difficult to overcome. The difference in our weapon skill was 18 points.
It mattered not one iota.

By the way it takes me well over a minute to beat up an Ice Boned skel in
melee alone. Multiply me by three it still takes more than the 'laughable'
20 seconds it took the three druids. For me its merely miss, miss, pierce
11, miss, miss, pierce 9...

Kitasi
